column4: Is ther a way to recapture an install from where it left off? or do I have to start it over?  And if I start it over would it be okay to just run it over top ot things, or should I reformat the HD and try again?
you can format the partition during the new install
when I did that last time I got "could not create file system" and it hung
you got the newest release of the installer cd?
